q1: One of the most standout football kits around.
a1: Always loved the BVB kits black and yellow is ALWAYS a cool kit.
a3: This is the only football kit I have seen on sale in a hipster clothes store.
q4: Bees, Ants, Wasps, and Similar Insects
a4: Based on the same template as the new Milan away shirt, the Dortmund 2018-19 Champions League jersey is predominantly yellow with a black brush stripe around the chest and sleeves.
q5: When the kit will be available to purchase online?
a5: Its always available in the online store
